did.unittitle: John Covert letter to Abram Hoogland
did.abstract: One 1811 letter from John Covert, Jr. of Long Island to his uncle, Abram Hoogland, discussing his prospects for divinity school and a riot that broke out at the commencement exercises of Columbia College in New York City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One letter from John Covert, Jr. of Long Island to his uncle, Abram Hoogland, discussing his prospects for divinity school and a riot that broke out at the commencement exercises of Columbia College in New York City. The letter is dated August 13, 1811.
